official_title: To amend the Controlled Substances Act to eliminate a provision that prohibits transfers of certain forfeited property to State or local law enforcement agencies in circumvention of State law.
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Amends the Controlled Substances Act to eliminate a provision that prohibits transfers of certain forfeited property to State or local law enforcement agencies in circumvention of State law.

titles.title: To amend the Controlled Substances Act to eliminate a provision that prohibits transfers of certain forfeited property to State or local law enforcement agencies in circumvention of State law.
